official_title: A bill to permit State and local governments to prescribe curfews and other airport noise regulations for airports in their jurisdictions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits State and local governments to prescribe curfews and other airport noise regulations for airports in their jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to permit State and local governments to prescribe curfews and other airport noise regulations for airports in their jurisdictions, and for other purposes.
